result.reason: Implement SOCKS4 proxy support for VNC connections and activate existing VNC proxy functionality which is currently not utilized by VncSharpCore.
result.approach: Extend VNCEnum.ProxyType with SOCKS4. Develop proxy clients for SOCKS4, SOCKS5, and HTTP to establish proxied network streams/sockets. Modify ProtocolVNC.Connect() to use a ProxyClientFactory to create and utilize the appropriate proxy client based on ConnectionInfo.VNCProxyType, and then pass the established proxied stream/socket to VncSharpCore.RemoteDesktop. Update the UI to include the SOCKS4 option and add corresponding localization strings. Ensure comprehensive unit tests are added for the new SOCKS4 functionality and existing proxy types.
